text: David L. Deen (born December 20, 1944) is an American politician in the state of Vermont. He was a member of the Vermont House of Representatives, sitting as a Democrat from the Windham-4 district, having been first elected in 1990. Deen served for years as chair of the House Committee on Natural Resources, Fish and Wildlife https://legislature.vermont.gov/people/single/2018/14511. He was a member of the Vermont Senate from 1987 to 1988. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Vermont House of Representatives Category:Vermont Democrats
title: David Deen
